award_title: Photogeneration and Control of Molecular Electron Spin Qubits for Quantum Information Science
subject: Stop digging up old analysis scripts for other groups
body:
Hi Michael,

Bet you've gotten at least a few "can you share your ODMR analysis code?" emails. Or had to explain the same processing pipeline twice.

I built Ouro to turn that into a single API endpoint. It's a thin layer over computational methods that lets other researchers call your workflow directly instead of recreating it. Consolidates what you're already doing—sharing scripts, answering methodology questions—into something durable.

Worth a quick call? No rush with the holidays, but happy to show you how it works.

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
